INVENTORY.DEFAULT_QUANTITY_DEFINITION: The default quantity allows you to customize the default quantity invoiced.  The invoicing module can change this quantity at invoice time.
INVENTORY.DOWNLOAD_TEMPLATE_HERE: Click here to download the inventory template file
INVENTORY.IMPORT_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: You are about to import the inventories from a CSV file
INVENTORY.IMPORT_DESCRIPTION: Please download and then fill in the template file appropriately with your inventory information. Then select the completed file via the input box below
INVENTORY.IMPORT_INFO: We encourage you to reuse existing inventory classes, inventory groups, inventory types, and inventory units where possible. See the pages under the 'Inventory' pages for known values.
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_BRAND_INFO: inventory_brand : the manufacturers brand for this type of item (optional)
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_CMM_INFO: inventory_ccm : average monthly comsumption rate (optional since it recomputed as needed, defaults to 0)
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_CODE_INFO: inventory_code : the desired code (shorthand identifier) for the inventory item.  If this or inventory_text matches an existing inventory, it will be used. Otherwise a new inventory class will be created.
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_CONSUMABLE_INFO: inventory_consumable : is the item consumable? (1=yes, 0=no, optional, defaults to 1)
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_GROUP_INFO: inventory_group : If this does not match an existing inventory group name, a new inventory group will be created with this name.
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_IS_ASSET_INFO: inventory_is_asset : is the item an asset? (1=yes, 0=no, optional, defaults to 0)
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_MODEL_INFO: inventory_model : the manufacturers model for this type of item (optional)
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_PRICE_INFO: inventory_unit_price : the sale price of the inventory in the enterprise currency
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_TEXT_INFO: inventory_text : the desired name/label for the inventory item.  If this or inventory_code matches an existing inventory, it will be used. Otherwise a new inventory class will be created.
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_TYPE_INFO: inventory_type : the type of the inventory such as Article, Service, Assembly or Other
INVENTORY.INVENTORY_UNIT_INFO: inventory_unit : the units for the inventory such as such as Piece, Tablet, Box, Bottle, etc
INVENTORY.NO_INVENTORY_REGISTERED: There is no inventory registered yet
INVENTORY.TEMPLATE_FILE_DESCRIPTION: Here is a file template for importing inventories
